name: Hot Dog Mechanic
description:
My very first game jam submission, 

GMTK Game Jam 2020

This is a 48 hour game making marathon, focused on design, mechanics, and clever ideas. The jam runs from July 10th, at 8PM UK time, to July 12th, at 8PM UK time.

What is the theme? Out of Control.

So i created a game where you ricochet hot dogs off moving platforms to kill bugs.  Once you launch a weenie, you have lost control.   A hot dog does as a hot dog does.
